title: Common Properties
description: Common Properties for storage Firefly Extensions.

created.description: Date of object creation in RFC 3999 date-time format. This property is automatically inserted by the service upon creation of an object. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

createdBy.description: User ID of the creator of this object. This property is automatically inserted by the service upon creation of an object. An example form is "abcdcafebabe@AdobeID".

lastModified.description: Date of the last object update in RFC 3999 date-time format. This property is automatically inserted by the service upon creation or update of an object. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

lastModifiedBy.description: User ID of the updating user of this object. This property is automatically inserted by the service upon creation of an object. An example form is "abcdcafebabe@AdobeID".
